name: Cognito: PreCognito
description:
After one "heck it, why not" -spur of the moment decision to go dumpster diving at a local landfill, you encounter a very old-school looking computer in a surprisingly good condition sitting on top of a surface. Excited with what you found, you take the device home with you, and plug it in without too much thought. To your amazement, it still works! You don't recognize the make or the model, but it springs to life all the same.

NOTE: This game will require you to download some files to your device. No malicious files will be distributed in this game. If you're unsure whether you trust downloaded files, use https://www.virustotal.com/ to check them! If you don't want to be subject to being required to download external files, this game might not be for you. It's a core game element, so that'd make playing the game a little difficult.

NOTE: This game collects anonymized player progression data using GameAnalytics. No personal data will be shared.

Heavily inspired (if not blatantly and shamelessly copied) by ae27ff, https://ae27ff.meme.tips/
